xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.name=Notifications ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.description=Display notifications about events happened on the wiki. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.count.name=Count ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.count.description=Maximum number of events to display by default ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.useUserPreferences.name=Use the preferences of the user ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.useUserPreferences.description=If true, the preferences of the user about notifications are used ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayOwnEvents.name=Display own events ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayOwnEvents.description=If true, the events of the current user are displayed like the others. They are hidden otherwise. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayMinorEvents.name=Display minor events ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayMinorEvents.description=If true, the events concerning minor revisions of pages are displayed like the others. They are hidden otherwise. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displaySystemEvents.name=Display system events ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displaySystemEvents.description=If true, the events triggered by the XWiki software are displayed like the others. They are hidden otherwise. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayReadEvents.name=Display read events ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayReadEvents.description=If true, the events that the user have already marked as read are displayed like the others. They are hidden otherwise. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.wikis.name=Wikis ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.wikis.description=List of wikis (comma-separated) to consider. This parameter is ignored if useUserPreferences is set to "true". ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.spaces.name=Spaces ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.spaces.description=List of spaces (comma-separated) to consider. This parameter is ignored if useUserPreferences is set to "true". ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.pages.name=Pages ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.pages.description=List of pages (full references, comma-separated) to consider. This parameter is ignored if useUserPreferences is set to "true". ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayReadStatus.name=Display "read" status ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayReadStatus.description=Either or not the status of the events (either it has been marked as read or not) should be displayed ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.users.name=Users ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.users.description=List of users to consider (comma-separated). Ignored if "useUserPreferences" is set to "true". ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayWatchedUsersOnly.name=Display followed users only ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayWatchedUsersOnly.description=Display only the events peformed by the given list of users (if empty, the list of followed users of the current user is used). ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayRSSLink.name=Display RSS link ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.displayRSSLink.description=Display a link to the RSS view of the current macro. ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.tags.name=Tags ### Missing: rendering.macro.notifications.parameter.tags.description=List of tags to consider (comma-separated). It only works on the current wiki. Ignored if "useUserPreferences" is set to "true". ### Missing: notifications.macro.noWatchedUsers=You are not following anybody. ### Missing: notifications.macro.whenNotView=Notifications Macro. Could be seen on 'view' mode. notifications.menu.nothing=No hi ha notificacions disponibles\! ### Missing: notifications.menu.more=Load older notifications ### Missing: notifications.menu.details=Details ({0})
